attributes.action: Send in military to Sudan to overthrow the government/army
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the government to take action and send in our military to Sudan to overthrow the government and stop the violence, terror & human right violations happening there.

We have a duty to protect these innocent people from living such a horrible life in a troubled country where young boys are forced to join the army and young girls raped and the innocent men in their families killed.

WE MUST STOP IT!
